name: Constellation Energy Corporation
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation is the nation’s largest producer of reliable, clean, carbon-free energy, supplying electricity, natural gas, and sustainable energy solutions to millions of homes and businesses across the United States. Spun off from Exelon in 2022 and headquartered in Baltimore, Maryland, Constellation operates a large fleet of nuclear, hydro, wind, and solar generation facilities, powering over 16 million homes and providing about 10% of the country’s clean energy. The company is publicly traded (NASDAQ: CEG) and ranks 186th on the Fortune 500 list.
